nodes.text: The Game Chambers of Questal were labyrinth arenas which Moff Bandor would throw his prisoners into. He would then hunt them for sport.

Including a space simulator, a laser maze, a pit of winds, a quarry, and a Hurlothrumbic Generator, the chambers were connected by a series of tunnels which the prisoners were forced to traverse if they hoped to survive.
A group of Rebel Alliance members managed to navigate and destroy the maze during a rescue mission for Tay Vanis.
